name: sales-booking-tool
description: Modern sales management and booking tool with AI-powered features

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
scripts.type-check: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run type-check" "cd backend && npm run type-check"

author: Sales Tool Team
